review: I originally tried two different Roku boxes. The first generation and the Roku3. Neither would work with my network reliably. The first gen would sort of work but would disconnect very often. The Roku 3 simply would not connect and stay connected to my wireless network. I spent countless hours trying to get them to work for my daughter's bedroom. I finally gave up on Roku and bought this unit.It was set up, connected to my network and playing videos in less than 5 minutes. It is incredibly fast compared to my other streamers and smart TV's.I will eventually replace all of my media streamers with these. Could not be more satisfied.
